section.title:
cash receipts
edit list for Cash Receipt Edit List
section.para: To view and edit unposted cash receipts, go to Accounting > Accounts Receivable > Cash Receipt > Edit List. The following screen will appear:
The Cash Receipt Edit List displays information on all unposted cash receipts, including customer name, distribution date, and distribution amount.

note.para: The Cash Receipt Edit List may include cash receipts generated as a result of post-authorized credit card charges.

tip.para: When editing a cash receipt, you may notice the Credit Card tab is not visible. This is an intentional design to prevent users from altering credit card transactions which have already been processed.
